name: Maurice EVERETT, Appellant v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Everett v. PA. Department of Probation & Parole

parties: Maurice EVERETT, Appellant v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of July, 2011, the Application for Summary Relief/Application for Stay is GRANTED to the extent that it requests summary relief. The order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. The Application for Summary Relief/Application for Stay is DISMISSED AS MOOT to the extent that it requests a stay of the briefing schedule.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
23 A.3d 1051
Maurice EVERETT, Appellant v. PA. DEPARTMENT OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 71 EAP 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 15, 2011.
